google chrome only

additional_info:
I used Ubuntu Condensed in this style , but since @import doesnt work here , it's required that you have Ubuntu font on your system .
You can get it here > http://font.ubuntu.com/

Google Chrome only , since Firefox doesnt display properly all css style . Other browsers were not tested :)
